name: CustomInfo
install_msg: Thanks for installing CustomInfo. Load the cog, and run `[p]help CustomInfo` for the commands. If you're the bounty creator, should you require any support, please join the support server: https://discord.gg/RSAetqdhRU. Else, you are not entitled to any support, if I don't want to give any.
description: Allows you to setup a custom info command.
short: Allows you to setup a custom info command.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data about users
